fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, slay a player, dealing a basic attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have four targets. When one dies, a new one replaces them. You donâ€™t know which players are targets, but are told when one dies.
- When you eliminate a target, you can immediately choose another player to attack. If the second chosen player is another target, you deal a basic attack to them. If the second player is not another target, your attack fails. This can only trigger once per night
